Reborn 2–{3}{B}, Sacrifice a creature. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
When Skull-Faced Duelist becomes reborn, each opponent loses life equal to its power and you gain that much life.
